categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Rebel Grand Medal of Resolution was a Rebel badge awarded to individuals who managed to "defeat the Imperial oppression at the Battle of Restuss." It was slightly higher in rank than the Rebel Medal of Resolution, awarded to individuals who, while not directly defeating the Imperials, nonetheless defended Rebel Alliance members during the battle.

The Rebel Grand Medal of Resolution appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Because of the player-optional nature of the Battle of Restuss, it is unknown whether the medal was ever canonically issued.
